game.name: Project: Firmament
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: PROJECT: FIRMAMENT is a top-down horde shooter where you blast through missions using a unique aiming system that puts quick-minded positioning, map knowledge, and loadout planning as the main contributors to your success.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PROJECT: FIRMAMENT is a top-down horde shooter where you blast through missions using a unique aiming system that puts quick-minded positioning, map knowledge, and loadout planning as the main contributors to your success.
